item.title: All 3 dog poo bins in Carlton Road open space are overflowing, 26th November
item.description:
All 3 dog poo bins in Carlton Road open space are overflowing - not been emptied for over 6 weeks now and people are now putting the bags of dog poo in the play area bins so this is making them smell as well and its getting really bad and needs to be sorted out ASAP - please can this be looked into
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marston Court, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The middle of the sidewalk in front of 2 Lindfield Gardens, 26th November
item.description:

item.title: Tent on street, 26th November
item.description:
Someone appears to be living in a tent outside Lidl, by the railway bridge. Could the council please send someone to do a welfare check? It’s so cold out, this person must be frozen.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Wickham Lane, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: White Chest of drawers dumped on road, 26th November
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Digby Crescent, Hackney, London
